name: MakingBacon
0:
”Alexa, start Making Bacon”
”Alexa, open Making Bacon”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: making bacon
des:
Listen to the mouthwatering sizzle of thick-cut, real wood-smoked Wright® Brand bacon any time you want! Play the sizzle in your car, in your kitchen, or even from the comfort of your own bed. Your ears will drool with delight as you enjoy the delicious crackles and pops of Bacon the Wright Way. Experience the sizzle in person by adding some savory Wright® Brand bacon to your cart today.
 
Wright® Brand. Since 1922.
